text: The Hellenic Football Federation (HFF) () is the governing body of football in Greece. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1926. It became a member of FIFA in 1927 and UEFA in 1954. Category:1926 establishments in Greece Category:Association football governing bodies in Europe Category:Football in Greece Category:Sports organizations of Greece
title: Hellenic Football Federation
